attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to light that MPs allowances are being abused wholesale.
I request that Parliament be dissolved immediately and that the population at large should be given the chance to re-elect their representative.
Public confidence in Parliament and voter turnout have dropped to an unacceptable low point.
Under the circumstances,this is the only option that will restore confidence in Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
